channel.title: Lost on the Hilt, so I left it here. (and cause of a noob)
channel.description:
Little sword i drew out a few days ago, decided to do it because of this moron: [quote="Asuyuka, post:16, topic:354711"]No reason to criticize his shit, besides SilentCJ, I don't see anyone else making models, so GTFO.[/quote]
I started out, very proud with the idea, as i have it drawn out on paper and it is great in theory, but I lack the skills to do it for the moment. I will finish it later on, I just need to get my Mouse and change programs.
If you need more pics ask. [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1568tpi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/20sinpe.png[/img]

Looks good, could be turned into a red Zanpaktoe if you wanted to.

item.title: Lost on the Hilt, so I left it here. (and cause of a noob)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

rip4d:

The pummel looks odd to me, and you can reduce the polygons on the hilt easily (same with the pummel, or is it pommel? :|) Aside from that I love the concept and the model. Nice job

The reason it has more poly on the pummel that it normally would, and why you barely see it, is because it has a “rib” style into it like the handle, just a bit finer ribbing.

@teh_codex - For the moment, this model will be on halt, until i can ‘fine’ my skills with detail.

Read full topic

Little sword i drew out a few days ago, decided to do it because of this moron:

Clay Box Girder Bridge

No reason to criticize his shit, besides SilentCJ, I don’t see anyone else making models, so GTFO.

I started out, very proud with the idea, as i have it drawn out on paper and it is great in theory, but I lack the skills to do it for the moment. I will finish it later on, I just need to get my Mouse and change programs.
